title: Unavailable Gp Skin?
body: I was wondering if anyone knew how to get the Gankplank skin if at all possible and i makes me mad because I have wanted to have all the skins for certain champs and now I don't for one of my favorite champs.

replies.body: Play as Gangplank in a Matchmade lobby. Solo only. This includes AI matches. Not customs though. You get it when the event ends.

This does not have to be solo, you can be with a group.

ARAMs also count, if you're lucky!
Ah, okay. I was told by a few people that it had to be Solo. My mistake. Thank you for clearing that up!
No worries! You can solo if you want, but you don't need to. :]
